item.title: Terminal Theme Feature Tour
item.description:
This post intentionally touches a bunch of Hugo features so you can verify rendering in the Terminal theme.

Quick Intro

  • Goal: sanity-check markdown, shortcodes, syntax highlighting, lists, tables, images, and embeds.
  • Tip: use this as a template for future posts.

Markdown Basics

Bold, italic, and inline code all behave as expected. You can also mix in a blockquote:

Great docs make great sites. â€” Someone testing Hugo

Lists

  • Ordered lists
    1. First
    2. Second
  • Unordered lists
    • Nested item A
    • Nested item B

Code Highlighting

Hugo will highlight fenced code blocks automatically:
